about_the_game:
Enter the world of TORSO TENNIS: a sports-like rogue-like. Do you have what it takes to perfect your build and win it all?

Features

  • Multi-ball tennis action. Serve up as many balls as you can and scramble to return serves from procedurally-generated tennis monstrosities.
  • Tons of builds. Find new limb combinations that absolutely wreck your foes and break the game.
  • Upgrade & Win. Spend your billz to upgrade your limbs and finally win the TORSO TENNIS season instead of wasting another torso from a perfectly good corpse.

Builds you should take for a spin

  • Are you a fan of SHARP OBJECTS? Slice through the competition with knife arms, scissor heads, and more.
  • Why serve Tennis Balls when you can serve Cheese Balls that slow down your foe?
  • Assemble a build out of Five "Leg-type" limbs and a fantastic Synergy Effect will happen. (not just massive gains on Leg Day)

What it's like to play TORSO TENNIS

  • AAAAAAHHHH MY LIMBS ARE ALL TENNIS RACKETS!
  • Okay, that's better, I was able to buy some actual legs now.
  • Is that a Dinosaur head? Guess I'm buying it!

name: TORSO TENNIS Demo
short_description: A Sports-like Roguelike. Draft limbs, Graft them to your TORSO, perfect a game-breaking build, then go head-to-head in multi-ball matches against cursed tennis monstrosities.
